attributes.action: We want NHS FACE TO FACE appointments back!
attributes.additional_details: Because we are paying our taxes but not getting a good service.
attributes.background: The NHS service to have face to face appointments back. We can't get proper treatment by phone or website, and sometimes our requests are ignored or very slow. We deserve a good health care service!

rejection.details:
There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Commission an independent review into GP access: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598947
